name: 曾恕銘
objective:
本課程程主要為介紹深度學習和生成式人工智慧概念和基本原理。通過掌握這些原理，學生能了解可能極限，更能思考深度學習和和生成式人工智慧的應用。
This course mainly introduces the concepts and basic principles of deep learning and generative artificial intelligence. By mastering these principles, students can understand the limits of what is possible and be better able to think about the applications of deep learning and generative artificial intelligence.
